column1:
‚ÄòNuff said! It works extremely well!

This is why ‚Äòwe‚Äô, as helpers, don‚Äôt get many calls. There simply are ‚Äútoo many‚Äù volunteers to cater to people‚Äôs egotistical personalities. I see people complaining about not getting calls or not getting ‚Äúenough‚Äù calls, so they delete the app. 
If you don‚Äôt get calls often, it just means that the blind ARE being helped; maybe not by you, but by someone. Isn‚Äôt that kind of what it‚Äôs all about? People helping people! 
DON‚ÄôT download if you‚Äôre only doing it to satisfy your egotistical needs!
NICE NICE NICEüòÅ

Very nice app and nice to have a feeling of helping others. 

There are a few things that need to be improved though; I miss some calls when answering from the lock-screen. 
Also, I often get the message that the call has already been answered - so either the other user has already been helped (so why bother me; make the calls 1-1) or the person hung up...which is totally fine :)
The last thing is that I've always hung up before the one who needed help and get a prompt asking if the other person was rude...should I let the blind person end the call?

Maybe at some point a more detailed app, i.e. an overview of how many people you helped or some more nerdy statistics. 
A scoreboard would probably make people be more helpful - so not just a score of how many people you helped, but maybe also of how many missed calls or how well you helped people. 

One other thing: there are not enough people to help/calls ;)
But it's a new program, so I guess we will get there.

Dette er en fantastisk god udviklet app og godt fundet p√•. Blinde og svagtseende kan ringe op til "skyen" af hj√¶lpere som har meldt sig til. Her v√¶lges der en tilf√¶ldig hj√¶lper som s√• ringes op. Hvis du har tiden besvarer du opkaldet, ellers g√•r det bare videre til den n√¶ste hj√¶lper.
N√•r et opkald besvares g√•r der et lille √∏jeblik og du f√•r kamera og taleforbindelse med vedkommende som √∏nsker hj√¶lp. Hj√¶lpen best√•r oftest af kontrol af udl√∏bsdatoer p√• f√∏devarer, farvevalg , tabte ting, generel orientering m.m . Hj√¶lpen tager sj√¶ldent mere end 5 min. For at der kan v√¶re lidt "sport" i at v√¶re en god hj√¶lper er der ogs√• et point system. Jo flere du hj√¶lper jo flere point. 
Ved tilmeldingen fort√¶ller du om du er blind/svagtseende eller om du er seende.
Den handicappede kan ved chikane melde dette ind og hj√¶lperen vil herved blive udelukket af gruppen og ikke kunne hj√¶lpe fremover.
Der er ogs√• nogle andre "misbrugs"-test som foretages.

en fantastisk app. er lige kommet hjem fra indk√∏b og har k√∏bt mad til b√•de i dag og i morgen. problemet var, om det var medisterp√∏lse eller b√∏ffer der var i pakken. men s√• var der en m√¶gtig flink dame, som kunne hj√¶lpe mig med at opklare mysteriet. tusind tak for hj√¶lpen.
